title: Executive Order 6752-Amendment of Schedule A, Subdivision XVIII, of the Civil Service Rules
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the provisions of the last sentence of the eighth paragraph of subdivision second of section 2 of the Civil Service Act of January 16, 1883 (ch. 27, 22 Stat. 403, 404), subdivision XVIII of schedule A of the civil-service rules is hereby amended by adding thereto the following paragraph:
"13. Positions in the National Soldiers' Home at Johnson City, Tennessee."
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6752-Amendment of Schedule A, Subdivision XVIII, of the Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362528
